welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Chesterfield, a charming city known for its quaint downtown, historic landmarks, and friendly locals. Get ready to explore and experience all that our city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This is the main terminal of Lambert-St. Louis International Airport, where most flights depart and arrive.

terminals.name: East Terminal
terminals.description: The East Terminal is primarily used for domestic flights and is connected to the Main Terminal via a shuttle service.

terminals.name: West Terminal
terminals.description: The West Terminal is used for international flights and is connected to the Main Terminal via a shuttle service.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: General Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.
